Articles.Content:
Hi Everyone!

Just wanted to let everyone know we devs are all back from our much-needed holiday break.

Also, this is a good place to announce our plans for the very near future:

As most of you know, the 0.13 release was the last free demo update. From 0.14 onwards, you\'ll need to order the game to get the latest version. 0.13 will remain forever available as a demo though.

That\'s probably old news, but I want to announce that there will be a 0.13.1 update coming up soon, which will also be available for free, and will take the place of 0.13 as the latest demo release.

This release will be a small update, just so we can have a demo compiled with the recently-released 3.5 version of Unity, which adds a heap of cool new features and does speed up the game quite a bit, and some tweaks to future-proof the demo against things we will add later.

For the main feature on the 0.14 update, we can\'t really make any official announcements yet, but we already have a more or less solid notion of what it will be. We will tell you more about it when we announce the features list for 0.14.

Well, I wish everyone a very good year!

Cheers
Welcome back Squad, hope you all had a good time off.

Wb!

We\'ve all taken to forming armies and claiming areas of Kerbin as territory.

We all missed you though, Harv
Don\'t forger about key for VAB_ANGLE_SNAP_INCLUDE_VERTICAL (or something, i don\'t remember precisely) in VAB.

Welcome back,

Whatever you do end up doing, you should consider tacking on some stock-part lunar landing legs. That way, I wouldn\'t have to have controlled crashes on the Mun anymore, and wouldn\'t have to download mods. (I don\'t like mods. No offense to those who do.)

Regards
Welcome back Harv, we\'ve missed you!
Welcome back from your well deserved break guys!

Welcome back!

I hope you enjoy the battlegrounds of the forums!

Welcome Back!

We were busy blowing up eachother while you were gone

The roleplaying forum was incredibly welcome.

Nice to have you back.

Thank you for all your hard work! I\'m super happy I pre-ordered and I\'m wonderfully delighted you guys are continuing this epic journey.

KEEP UP THE GREAT WORK!

Glad to have you guys back, could you look at this: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=5478.0

Nevermind, I think it was fixed in the revision.

Glad to have the best Devs in indie games back.

Great to see you\'re back!

Things got hairy for a bit, but it\'s been sorted out now.
Welcome back guys.
Now we\'re all backs!

Soooo... should that be 'gladden your back' or 'glad you\'re back'? I\'m not sure which one I like more.

And yeah, welcome back Harv and the team!
I salute you very much for the roleplay forum.

Welcome back, hope your vacation was better than mine.

And you know that you now started the rumor mill, yes? I hope you\'re happy, now I can\'t sleep, wondering just what .14 is gonna get us.
You had a holiday? I didn\'t even notice. :/
you guys said you needed a break a break form what are you are doing is small bug fixes wow so hard :P :P
Uh. A break to spend the holidays with their families / loved ones maybe?

you guys said you needed a break a break form what are you are doing is small bug fixes wow so hard :P :P

Let the grownups work; why don\'t you go play ball with the other children of your elementary school?

Let the grownups work; why don\'t you go play ball with the other children of your elementary school?

im home school and everyone else that lives near me are bullys so no think you i do have some one but he is 5 miles away and all we do at his house is minecraft star craft XD
